name: Paradise Beach Girls
description:
This is a relaxing Visual Novel in which you meet and talk with 5 different girls:
LiMing, Shima, Nozomi, Himari, Xuan

The conversations are casual, soft or sexy.
Each girl has a different personality and unique traits.
Discover all their stories and decide in the end which one deserves to be invited to dinner.
Some are more confident than the others and will try to hit on you.
They are all dressed in provocative bikinis, as the action takes place in Miami.
Flex your muscles in front of them and get as much details as you can.
You're no longer the nerd that girls used to refuse back in your home town.
Good luck!
